ALCHEMY

Also: Chemistry, Bombs, Mutations

You may perform the Inventory action to rapidly craft a potion with powerful but somewhat unpredictable effects. When you do so, choose one type of mix among those you have unlocked (basic, advanced or superior) and spend the appropriate amount of Inventory Points. 

 

MixIP Cost Description
Basic3 Roll two d20s and assign one to target and one to effect. 
Advanced4 Roll three d20s and assign one to target and one to effect. 
Superior5 Roll four d20s and assign one to target and one to effect. 

 

When you create a mix, roll the amount of twenty-sided dice indicated by that mix, then assign one of those rolls to the target table (below) and one to the effect table (on the right). Discard all remaining dice, then describe the effects of the mix!

Example: You spend 5 Inventory Points for a superior mix and roll four twenty-sided dice. You roll 3, 14, 9 and 4. You might assign 14 to target and 9 to effect to grant yourself and all allies Resistance to air and fire; or you could go on the offensive and assign 9 to target and 4 to effect to deal bolt damage to a single enemy; or even assign 9 to target and 14 to effect to inflict four status effects on that foe!

Whatever your choice, the two dice you don't assign will be discarded.

The two effects marked with "Any" on the effect table are always available and can be chosen if none of the available effects appeal to you. 

 

TARGET

Die The potion affects... 
1-6 ... you or one ally you can see that is present on the scene. 
7-11 ... one enemy you can see that is present on the scene. 
12-16 ... you and every ally present on the scene. 
17-20 ... every enemy present on the scene. 

 

EFFECT

Die Each creature affected by the potion... 
Any ... suffers @DMG[20 poison] damage.
Any ... recovers @GAIN[30 hp]. 
1 ... treats their Dexterity (@EFFECT[dex-up]) and Might (@EFFECT[mig-up]) dice as if they were one size higher (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of your next turn. 

2 ... treats their Insight (@EFFECT[ins-up]) and Willpower (@EFFECT[wlp-up]) dice as if they were one size higher (up to a maximum of d12) until the end of your next turn. 

3 ... suffers @DMG[20 air] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 air] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 air] damage if you are level 40 or higher. 
4 ... suffers @DMG[20 bolt] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 bolt] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 bolt] damage if you are level 40 or higher. 
5 ... suffers @DMG[20 dark] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 dark] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 dark] damage if you are level 40 or higher. 
6 ... suffers @DMG[20 earth] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 earth] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 earth] damage if you are level 40 or higher. 
7 ... suffers @DMG[20 fire] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 fire] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 fire] damage if you are level 40 or higher. 
8 ... suffers @DMG[20 ice] damage. This amount increases to @DMG[30 ice] damage if you are level 20 or higher, or to @DMG[40 ice] damage if you are level 40 or higher. 
9 ... gains Resistance to air (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogQWlyIiwiY2hhbmdlcyI6W3sia2V5Ijoic3lzdGVtLmFmZmluaXRpZXMuYWlyIiwibW9kZSI6MCwidmFsdWUiOiJ1cGdyYWRlIn1dLCJpY29uIjoiaWNvbnMvbWFnaWMvZGVmZW5zaXZlL3NoaWVsZC1iYXJyaWVyLWZsYW1pbmctcGVudGFnb24tdGVhbC1wdXJwbGUud2VicCJ9]) and fire (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogRmlyZSIsImNoYW5nZXMiOlt7ImtleSI6InN5c3RlbS5hZmZpbml0aWVzLmZpcmUiLCJtb2RlIjowLCJ2YWx1ZSI6InVwZ3JhZGUifV0sImljb24iOiJpY29ucy9tYWdpYy9kZWZlbnNpdmUvc2hpZWxkLWJhcnJpZXItZmxhbWluZy1wZW50YWdvbi1yZWQud2VicCJ9]) damage until the end of the scene. 
10  ... gains Resistance to bolt (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogQm9sdCIsImNoYW5nZXMiOlt7ImtleSI6InN5c3RlbS5hZmZpbml0aWVzLmJvbHQiLCJtb2RlIjowLCJ2YWx1ZSI6InVwZ3JhZGUifV0sImljb24iOiJpY29ucy9tYWdpYy9kZWZlbnNpdmUvc2hpZWxkLWJhcnJpZXItZmxhbWluZy1wZW50YWdvbi1ibHVlLXllbGxvdy53ZWJwIn0=]) and ice (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogSWNlIiwiY2hhbmdlcyI6W3sia2V5Ijoic3lzdGVtLmFmZmluaXRpZXMuaWNlIiwibW9kZSI6MCwidmFsdWUiOiJ1cGdyYWRlIn1dLCJpY29uIjoiaWNvbnMvbWFnaWMvZGVmZW5zaXZlL3NoaWVsZC1iYXJyaWVyLWZsYW1pbmctcGVudGFnb24tYmx1ZS53ZWJwIn0=]) damage until the end of the scene. 
11  ... gains Resistance to dark (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogRGFyayIsImNoYW5nZXMiOlt7ImtleSI6InN5c3RlbS5hZmZpbml0aWVzLmRhcmsiLCJtb2RlIjowLCJ2YWx1ZSI6InVwZ3JhZGUifV0sImljb24iOiJpY29ucy9tYWdpYy9kZWZlbnNpdmUvc2hpZWxkLWJhcnJpZXItZmxhbWluZy1wZW50YWdvbi1tYWdlbnRhLndlYnAifQ==]) and earth (@EFFECT[eyJuYW1lIjoiUmVzaXN0YW5jZTogRWFydGgiLCJjaGFuZ2VzIjpbeyJrZXkiOiJzeXN0ZW0uYWZmaW5pdGllcy5lYXJ0aCIsIm1vZGUiOjAsInZhbHVlIjoidXBncmFkZSJ9XSwiaWNvbiI6Imljb25zL21hZ2ljL2RlZmVuc2l2ZS9zaGllbGQtYmFycmllci1mbGFtaW5nLXBlbnRhZ29uLW9yYW5nZS53ZWJwIn0=]) damage until the end of the scene. 
12 ... suffers @EFFECT[enraged]. 
13 ... suffers @EFFECT[poisoned]. 
14 ... suffers @EFFECT[dazed], @EFFECT[shaken], @EFFECT[slow], and @EFFECT[weak]. 
15 ... recovers from all status effects. 
16-17 ... recovers @GAIN[50 hp] and @GAIN[50 mp]
18 ... recovers @GAIN[100 hp]
19 ... recovers @GAIN[100 mp]
20 ... recovers @GAIN[100 hp] and @GAIN[100 mp]

INFUSIONS

Also: Arcane Ammunition, Blade Coatings, Combat Runes

When you successfully hit one or more targets with an attack, you may spend @LOSS[2 ip] to produce a special infusion and apply the corresponding effect to that attack (if the attack had the multi property, apply the effects of the infusion to each target).

You cannot apply more than one infusion to the same attack; producing and using an infusion are both part of the action you used to attack with the weapon. 

BASIC INFUSIONS

INFUSIONS EFFECT
Cryo The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes ice @ICON[ice]. 
Pyro The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes fire @ICON[fire]. 
Volt The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes bolt @ICON[bolt]. 

ADVANCED INFUSIONS

INFUSIONS EFFECT
Cyclone The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes air @ICON[air]. 
Exorcism The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes light @ICON[light]. 
Seismic The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes earth @ICON[earth]. 
Shadow The attack deals 5 extra damage, and its damage becomes dark @ICON[dark]. 

 

SUPERIOR INFUSIONS

INFUSIONS EFFECT
Vampire

 Choose one option: you recover an amount of HP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack; OR you recover an amount of MP equal to half the HP loss suffered by the target of the attack. 

 This infusion can only be used if the attack targeted a single creature. 

Venom The attack deals 5 extra damage, its damage becomes poison @ICON[poison], and each creature hit by the attack suffers poisoned.

MAGITECH

Also: Engineering, Golemcraft, Robotics. 

This invention type grants a variety of different benefits. 

 

MAGITECH OVERRIDE (BASIC)

Add the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aPfawWXZqKuHAAqj]{Magitech Override} feature to your character sheet.

You may use an action and spend @LOSS[10 mp] to perform an Opposed 【INS + INS】 Check against a nearby soldier-rank construct you can see (the Game Master must tell you who is a valid target). If you succeed, you gain control of the creature until the end of the scene (the Game Master gives you its profile). You may only control one construct at any given time, but may set it free whenever you want; the construct is also set free as soon as it is harmed by you or by one of your allies. Once free, the construct is again in control of its actions and might turn against you. 

 

MAGICANNON (ADVANCED)

Add the @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.AbazTRyaMTW4ouhx]{Magicannon (Item)} to your character sheet.

You may perform the Inventory action and spend @LOSS[3 ip] Inventory Points to create a firearm weapon known as a magicannon (see below). The magicannon will crumble to pieces as soon as you use create a new magicannon. When you create a magicannon, choose the type of damage it deals (air, bolt, earth, fire, ice, or physical).

WEAPON ACCURACY DAMAGE QUALITIES
Magicannon【DEX + INS】 +1 【HR + 10】  Two-handed - Ranged - No Quality. 

MAGISPHERES (SUPERIOR)

Add three @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.7dUU12f8IHa2tESo]{Magisphere (Superior)} to your character sheet.

You develop three magisphere prototypes; each of them can replicate a spell chosen from the following lists: Elementalist, Entropist and Spiritist. The spells you choose may come from the same list or different lists.

You also develop two more prototypes upon reaching level 20, and another two upon reaching level 40 (the same applies if you already reached those levels).

You may perform the Inventory action and spend @LOSS[2 ip] to create a magisphere and immediately perform the Spell action for free, casting one of the spells you have developed a prototype for. The spell follows the normal rules (including MP costs and Magic Checks) and the magisphere is destroyed upon use.

GADGET - ALCHEMY

  1. Add the following gadget to your character sheet: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.SsR6UJXT65Q1qNO2]{Alchemy}

  2. Import the following rollable tables to your world: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.rollable-tables.RollTable.TvH7gOE0xQYeimUF]{Alchemy: Effect} and @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.rollable-tables.RollTable.vZa3GMOzrEVma2Hv]{Alchemy: Target}

  3. Open the alchemy sheet and navigate to "Config" tab

  4. Under "Target Rollable Table" select "Alchemy: Target"

  5. Under "Effect Rollable Table" select "Alchemy: Effect"

GADGET - INFUSION

  1. Add the following gadget to your character sheet: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.1tfYFkiXLuTOUmre]{Infusion}

  2. Perform an Accuracy Check like you'd normally do; roll a weapon.

  3. In the chat message, right click, select "Apply Infusion", and select an infusion in the dialog menu.

GADGET - MAGITECH

  1. Add the following gadget to your character sheet: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.EmwWSYlFjlUSGPLL]{Magitech}

  2. For basic rank, add the following item to your character sheet: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.skills.Item.aPfawWXZqKuHAAqj]{Magitech Override}

  3. For advanced rank, add the following item to your character sheet: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.consumables.Item.AbazTRyaMTW4ouhx]{Magicannon (Item)}

  4. For superior rank, pick three spells from the following lists: @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.hK8r8lsQNaknSqdq.JournalEntryPage.z1OeFUn5ckVmO5oW]{Elementalist Spells}, @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.jZeTJrK0mFsRyz8S.JournalEntryPage.z1OeFUn5ckVmO5oW]{Entropist Spells}, and @UUID[Compendium.projectfu.handouts.JournalEntry.L65ajg6cmHEk3zAP.JournalEntryPage.z1OeFUn5ckVmO5oW]{Spiritist Spells}
